Description: Position Title:         Aftermarket Area Sales ManagerEmployment Type: Full-timeSalary:         up to 15K AED, all-inclusive depending on experience and qualificationsJob Location:         Dubai, UAEAbout the Client: One of the region's fastest-growing automotive brake parts manufacturers.Job Description:  Responsible for driving sales and meeting revenue targets within UAE & GCC Establish strong relationships with existing clients, identify new business opportunities, and work closely with the marketing and product teams Create and execute a strategic sales plan that expands the customer base and extends the market reach Collaborate with marketing to promote spare parts through various channels and attend trade shows, exhibitions, networking events to represent the company Monitor competition, market trends, and customer feedback to optimize sales strategiesSkills
Skills:  Open to Indian and Arabic nationals
 Bachelor’s Degree in Business, Marketing, Engineering, or related field
 Minimum 5 years of experience in spare parts sales industry; familiarity with these brands is preferred – Denso / FBK /DJ /QSTEN /KOYO
 Must have strong understanding of the Automotive Aftermarket spare parts market and industry trends
 Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets

Data.Company Industry: Automotive Manufacture; Automotive Dealership & Distributor; Automotive Repair, Spare Parts, & Support Services
